basic.description: Lectures, tutorial sessions, laboratory projects, drug literature evaluation, and self-directed critical analysis of a current research area in Pharmacology. Topics include: neuropsychopharmacology, cardiovascular-renal pharmacology, agents acting on the endocrine system, and chemotherapy. Winter; 3 lecture hours and 3 laboratory hours.  D.H. Maurice EXCLUSION:  PHAR-450*, PHAR-850*. Permission of the Graduate Program required.
basic.subject: BMED
basic.title: Principles of General Pharmacology II
